name: worm-project
description: Worm project with frontend, backend, and api-client

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd api-client && npm install && npm build && npm pack && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build: npm run update-api-client && cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && .\mvnw clean package
scripts.lint:ci: cd backend && .\mvnw spotless:check && cd ../frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && .\mvnw spotless:apply && cd ../frontend && npm run lint -- --fix
